text: Gennadiy Nikolayevich Seleznyov (; 6 November 1947 â€“ 19 July 2015) was a Russian politician. He was the Speaker of the Duma from 1996 to 2003. Seleznyov died in Moscow at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Members of the State Duma Category:Legislative speakers Category:Politicians from Sverdlovsk Oblast
title: Gennadiy Seleznyov
